clinical_study.brief_title: The PRE-D Trial: Effect of Dapagliflozin, Metformin and Physical Activity in Pre-diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Dapagliflozin, Metformin and Physical Activity on Glucose Variability, Body Composition and Cardiovascular Risk in Pre-diabetes

brief_summary.textblock: The overall objective is to compare the short-term (3 months) effectiveness of three glucose-lowering interventions (dapagliflozin, metformin and physical activity) on glucose variability, body composition, and cardiometabolic risk factors in overweight or obese individuals with pre-diabetes (HbA1c 5.7-6.4% / 39-47 mmol/mol).

detailed_description.textblock: Different medical therapies and lifestyle modification for the prevention of type 2 diabetes have yet to be compared head-to-head in individuals with pre-diabetes. This research project will compare different glucose-lowering interventions in overweight and obese individuals with HbA1c levels in the pre-diabetic range.
